name: Daniel Freitas Vilha
profile: Experienced Android Developer (Java and Kotlin, Android 4 to 9), passionate about innovation and technology. Expertise on delivering applications throught all SDLC (from the initial prototype, UX/UI designs, and development to publication in the Play store) using Agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban) and cross-functional teams. Always working with the best practices as Clean Architecture (MVVM and MVC), Design patterns, material design, TDD and CI/CD. Experience using Android SDK, standard libraries as Realm, RxJava, RxAndroid, Dagger2 and Retrofit. Familiarity with RESTful APIs and JSON to connect applications to back-end services. Engaging in code reviews, to ensure technical implementations meet functional requirements, unit testing and mentoring other team members in fast-paced environments with varied and rapidly changing goals.
